mapper.select: SELECT s.name, l.url_pattern FROM links l INNER JOIN series s ON s.id = l.serie_id WHERE s.name LIKE '%' || #{serieName} || '%'
SELECT l.id, l.url_pattern, l.serie_id, s.name FROM links l INNER JOIN series s ON s.id = l.serie_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO links (serie_id, url_pattern) VALUES (#{serieId}, #{urlPattern}) RETURNING id
mapper.update: UPDATE links SET serie_id = #{serieId}, url_pattern = #{urlPattern} WHERE id = #{id}
